key.name: show-weeks
key.description: If this is set to true, week numbers will be shown in the calendar.

key.name: date-format
key.summary: The date format string passed to strftime
key.description: The date format used by wingpanel.indicator.datetime. If blank, the default date format is "%a, %b %e". This may be set to any valid strftime date format. Look at the man page on strftime for more information.
